title: BookWise
description: A comprehensive University Library Management System with user-friendly interfaces for students and administrators.
detailedDescription: BookWise is a comprehensive University Library Management System featuring an intuitive admin panel for librarians. The platform enables students to browse the catalog, borrow and return books, manage reservations, and track their reading history. Administrators can efficiently manage inventory, monitor circulation, generate reports, and handle user accounts through a secure dashboard interface.
features: Advanced book search and catalog browsing
Secure user authentication for students and staff
Automated notification system for due dates

title: Socially
description: Full-stack social media platform with authentication, real-time updates, and responsive design.
detailedDescription: Socially is a modern social media platform built with Next.js and powered by Clerk authentication. Users can create profiles, share posts, engage with content through likes and comments, and follow other users. The platform features a responsive design that works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices. Data is stored in a Neon SQL database with Prisma as the ORM for efficient data management.
features: Post creation with rich media support
